component_summary.name: Breadcrumb
component_summary.description: Accessible breadcrumb primitives (nav, ol, li, link, current page, separators). Lightweight presentation components providing consistent styling and optional separators/ellipsis for truncated trails.

components.name: BreadcrumbList
components.description: Ordered list container styled for inline breadcrumb display.

components.name: BreadcrumbItem
components.description: List item wrapper used for each breadcrumb entry.

components.name: BreadcrumbLink
components.description: Anchor wrapper (supports asChild) for clickable breadcrumb items; applies hover/transition styles.

components.name: BreadcrumbPage
components.description: Non-interactive element representing the current page (aria-current='page').

components.name: BreadcrumbSeparator
components.description: Presentation-only separator element (defaults to ChevronRight SVG) used between items; marked aria-hidden.

components.name: BreadcrumbEllipsis
components.description: Presentation-only ellipsis control (MoreHorizontal icon) used when trimming long breadcrumb trails; aria-hidden.

notes: Presentation-only primitives with no business logic; accessibility attributes (aria-current, aria-hidden, role) are applied appropriately.
Duplication risk is minimal; consistent cn utility used for class composition.
Useful as a composable primitive for top-level navigation UIs.
